page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE IN WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: Most families in West Kilbride are {small}and are quite{well off financially. People live comfortable lives. Most families live in{private {houses,}own at least one car, and have holidays abroad each year. A{typical day}might be similar to the following:- A family would usually get up about 7am, wash and dress and then the adults would go to work at about 8am, whereas the children would leave at 8.30am to go to school. Many mothers are housewives and, as West Kilbride is a small village, they would shop for small amounts of messages each day. Most children would go home for lunch at 12.30. The family would eventually all get together again for their evening meal and then spend the evening watching T.V. or pursuing various hobbies.
